title: about me
text: MarkDown Basics

title: Laura Oliveira CV
text:
Business Analytics Student, Data Visualization Analyst, and Multilingual Professional.

oli20004@byui.edu | LinkedIn Profile



Building data-driven solutions and advancing business insights.


Data visualization, analytics, and business intelligence.



Data analysis, business process optimization, cross-functional collaboration.





September 2021 - December 2025
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, ID
- Bachelor of Business Analytics
- Certificate in Data Science
- Scholarship: Reed’s Dairy Full Ride Scholarship
- Society: Women in Business




January 2024 - Present
Data Visualization Analyst
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, ID
- Developed interactive Power BI dashboards, enhancing decision-making for 5,000+ students and streamlining administrative processes by 25%.
- Analyzed data from 120 databases using SQL, increasing operational efficiency by 12%.
- Automated workflows with RAPTOR software, boosting efficiency by 30%.
- Created 20+ calculated measures with DAX, advancing visualization impact.
April 2022 - January 2024
Transfer Evaluation Lead Analyst
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, ID
- Led a team of 14 to process 850 transcripts monthly, maintaining a 96% accuracy rate.
- Partnered with 10 academic departments to resolve credit transfer discrepancies.
- Improved student satisfaction by addressing inquiries promptly.
March 2020 - January 2022
Bilingual Program Coordinator
Piedade School, Recife, Brazil
- Supervised 280 students and 12 CELTA-certified teachers in the Cambridge ESL program.
- Improved communication methods, increasing satisfaction by 25%.
- Updated 10 program modules to align with educational standards.




February 2024 – April 2024
Student Consultant
Gibby Group
- Created R Studio and Tableau reports, improving decision-making by 5%.
- Designed 7 interactive visualizations, increasing engagement by 30%.
- Enhanced accessibility of reports across 4 departments and respective companies.





Data Analysis: SQL, Power BI, DAX, Excel

Business Intelligence Tools: Python, R, Machine Learning Algorithms, Tableau

Languages: Spanish (Fluent), Portuguese (Fluent)

Soft Skills: Team Collaboration, Analytical Thinking, Problem Solving






Reed’s Dairy Full Ride Scholarship

Member of Women in Business society
